column4: Hi guys...I've noticed that Ubuntu has updated Firefox to Shiretoko 3.5.  However, my online bank does not support this browser....can I revert back in any way?
jaunty ? use firefox 3.0.x both are installed side by side
or as n8tuser says use the user agent switcher extension to pretend to be normal firefox
thanks very much...just installed it and it works.  I find it amusing that the switcher extension does not offer Firefox as an option :D
